last_episode_to_air.name: Helicopters Attacked
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s a busy night in Newcastle for Northumbria Police as they work the night-time economy shift. We take a look at one of the most dangerous specialties in the police – firearms. The National Police Air Service face danger in the air.

name: Critical Incident
overview: With attacks on emergency service workers on the rise, this series uses bodycam and CCTV footage to tell the stories of brave 999ers assaulted in the line of duty.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: A police officer is stabbed in the arm as he tries to help a shopkeeper trapped inside a convenience store with a knifeman.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: An officer fears for his life when a drunk man turns violent and threatens to kill him.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A police officer is thrown 100 feet in the air when joyriders plough into him at 50 mph.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: A detective has a chemical thrown in her face as she tries to apprehend a gang of burglars, a police officer is injured as he tries to arrest a man who is threatening to kill officers with a machete, and a paramedic is headbutted by a patient.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: It's Bonfire Night, the worst night of the year for violent attacks on firefighters.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A police officer has his finger badly bitten as he tries to stop a criminal from spitting at him.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: A paramedic couple face their worst nightmare when the wife hears over the radio that her husband has been attacked by a patient.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: An undercover cop chasing down county lines drugs dealers is dragged along the road by a car as he tries to apprehend the driver.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: An officer fears for her life as an unprovoked attack in Birmingham city centre sees her strangled.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A police officer is left with life-changing injuries after a high-speed car chase ends with a criminal driver mowing her down.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In Essex, police officers are doused in petrol and threatened with being set alight when a moped chase ends in chaos.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: A shocking discovery by two unarmed police officers brings a bomb disposal unity to a leafy suburb of Merseyside.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: In Humberside, firefighters are shocked when they are attacked by the residents of a burning house as they try to put out the flames.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Firefighters in Newcastle and Humberside are out on shift in the days leading up to Bonfire Night, the most dangerous time of the year.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In Ashford, a report of a burglary ends with a police officer fighting a man armed with a knife. A dog handler with West Midlands Police is impaled on a spiked fence as he and his four-legged colleague chase down a suspected thief, and Kent Police officers get to grips with taser training.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: A rural village becomes the scene of a violent gun fight when a firearms team confronts an armed man.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Two life-changing assaults cost a police officer his career and have a huge impact on his health as he is diagnosed with complex PTSD. In Kent, the drugs and gangs team are out on a raid, tackling the growing drug problem in their county.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: A police officer shot at close range is in danger of losing his sight, and a speeding motorcyclist is pursued through London.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A former policeman from Northern Ireland rebuilds his life after losing both arms in a rocket attack on his vehicle. In Leeds, a patient threatens a paramedic with a 12-inch knife, and a Humberside police officer is determined to get back on the beat after a stay at the Police Treatment Centre.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: A PCSO and his colleague are attacked as they try to arrest a man suspected of a spate of burglaries at Christmas.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A Critical Incident special exploring what it takes to police Britain’s roads, including a Metropolitan Police operation to tackle moped-enabled crime.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A Critical Incident special looking at knife crime in the UK, including a dedicated police task force in Essex and a groundbreaking scheme in the West Midlands.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: The Covid-19 pandemic brings fresh dangers for emergency service workers all over the UK, including a surge in coughing attacks on police officers. Also, how groundbreaking research into the psychology of crowds could help prevent attacks on police.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Kent Police officers risk their lives to rescue an individual trapped on a cliff face. West Midlands police track down a man in possession of a gun, and how man’s best friend came to play an essential role in British policing, tracking down criminals and protecting their handlers.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Firefighters in Newcastle and Humberside are out on shift in the days leading up to Bonfire Night, the most dangerous time of the year.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In a bid to protect his colleagues from a man wielding three knives, a police sergeant in Bristol activates his taser. A Yorkshire paramedic is threatened with a gun when he’s called out to a house, and Warwickshire Police officers undertake advanced driver training.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In Wolverhampton, two paramedics are on a long road to recovery after they are both stabbed while on duty. A rookie police officer in Wellingborough rescues a woman from a house fire. In Southampton, a brave police officer risks his life when he jumps into the sea to save a girl from drowning.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: A West Midlands police officer is the victim of a brutal assault when he follows a suspect into a storm drain. Two paramedics are attacked by an intoxicated man in the back of their ambulance, and a Northampton PC works hard to tackle knife crime in the city.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: In Lancashire, a police sergeant is the victim of a brutal attack, while in Northamptonshire, a police dog comes to the rescue. In Bristol, a man goes on a knife rampage.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: In Kent, an officer and his police dog chase down a criminal. A brave PC confronts an armed robber who entered a restaurant with a knife, and a firefighter in Leicestershire is assaulted when he tries to put out a garden fire.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: In Kent, a police sergeant puts his life in danger when he rescues a man from a house fire, while in Bristol, two cops wrestle an armed robber to the ground. In Oxfordshire, after being assaulted by a man he was trying to help, a paramedic has an arranged meeting with the offender.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: In Derbyshire, a brave officer puts his life in danger when he tries to stop a dam from bursting. In south Wales, a paramedic is assaulted while on duty, and we see how brazen armed robbers livestream on social media as police give pursuit.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In south Wales, a man threatens two police officers with a gun when they visit his home. In Kent, a young call handler uses her training to de-escalate an extremely dangerous situation where a man is threatening a family member with a knife. Elsewhere, police chase down ram-raiding thieves.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: A Gloucestershire police officer responds to a gas leak and performs CPR on a teenage boy. With attacks on firefighters at an all-time high, we follow Humberside Fire and Rescue on their busiest night of the year, Bonfire Night.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: In Manchester, plain-clothed police officers chase a gunman, and in Northampton, firearms officers are called out when a man arrives at a police station claiming he has a bomb.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: A West Midlands police officer receives life-changing injuries when a man viciously bites his finger. With the help of his support dog Holly, a PC who has been diagnosed with PTSD helps other sufferers, and we follow Leicestershire Fire and Rescue as they carry out training at an airport.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: A Warwickshire police officer uses his medical training to save the lives of two stab victims, and a mountain bike paramedic is violently attacked in Manchester city centre.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: A paramedic experiences mental health issues after being assaulted but learns how to help others. In North Yorkshire, traffic police officers have their car rammed by a thief.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: When a woman is stabbed in Coventry, a police officer uses his first aid skills to help save her life. We find out what it takes to become a police horse in the Avon and Somerset mounted section, and a specialist task force tackles crime in the Greater Manchester area.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: It’s a busy few hours for Avon and Somerset police officers on the night shift in Bristol, and a North Wales PC talks about the difficulties faced as a visible minority in the force. With assaults on police officers at an all-time high, we examine how anything can become a weapon in the wrong hands.

episodes.name: High-Speed Crash
episodes.overview: A Surrey police officer receives life-changing injuries when his patrol car is involved in a terrifying high-speed crash. Two officers in Cheshunt risk their lives and run into a burning building.

episodes.name: Broadsword Stabbing
episodes.overview: In London, a Met officer is attacked by a man wielding a four-foot-long broadsword. An officer in York must use all her strength and courage to rescue a colleague who has fallen into an icy river.

episodes.name: Surrey Wildfire
episodes.overview: Two officers in south Wales are confronted by a man with a kitchen knife. In Leeds, a traffic cop puts his life at risk to save a driver trapped in his van. Surrey Fire and Rescue service are faced with a huge wildfire.

episodes.name: Stabbed in the Neck
episodes.overview: A Birmingham police officer is stabbed in the neck by someone he is arresting. In Hull, an officer and his faithful police dog come under a violent attack. After a life-threatening injury, a West Midlands paramedic has found a new lease of life, thanks to an unusual hobby.

episodes.name: Knife Attack
episodes.overview: Two officers in Leeds are faced with a knifeman on a city-centre bus. Sussex police take on the dangerous drivers putting us all at risk on the roads, and we catch up with an officer seriously injured in an attack.

episodes.name: Assault on Paramedic
episodes.overview: Two RAF aircraft are dispatched to save the life of a sailor in heavy seas 800 miles out in the Atlantic. Essex police film dangerous drivers from an HGV, with life-changing results for some of them. A paramedic in Barry in Wales finds herself the victim of a terrifying assault.

episodes.name: A Problem Patient
episodes.overview: 999ers on the scene look back at the 7/7 attacks in London. Police are called as a volatile patient assaults two paramedics on the Isle of Wight. In Manchester, a young police dog and his handler face a man armed with a crowbar.

episodes.name: Crushed by Van
episodes.overview: A Merseyside police officer is run over as he searches a van thought to be connected to drug runners. A call handler in Hampshire saves the life of a baby who isn’t breathing. After a life-changing injury, a former PC is finding his feet again.

episodes.name: Taser Discharged
episodes.overview: In London, emergency responders remember the nightmare they faced during the Westminster Bridge terror attack. In Staffordshire, a newly taser-trained PC must decide whether to fire her weapon for the first time, at a machete-wielding woman.

episodes.name: Car Park Gunman
episodes.overview: In Staffordshire, two officers save the life of a man in a burning building. In Avon and Somerset, police tackle county lines drug dealing, and in Norfolk, two firearms officers come face to face with a gunman in a car park.

episodes.name: RAF Rescue
episodes.overview: In Wakefield, a police officer is the victim of a violent attack. Greater Manchester Police are tackling the issue of knife crime in the city. The RAF are called in to help transatlantic rowers in distress.

episodes.name: London Bridge Attack
episodes.overview: Two paramedics talk of their experience on the scene of the 2017 London Bridge attacks. In Manchester, the police launch a new initiative to crack down on knife crime. After losing his eye, a former police officer has returned to the force in a new role.

episodes.name: Derbyshire Drugs Gang
episodes.overview: A Fire crew in Burnley comes under attack on their busiest night of the year. In Swindon, two paramedics are violently assaulted by a patient, and police in Derbyshire tackle the problem of county lines drug gangs.

episodes.name: Sexual Assault
episodes.overview: In London, a paramedic is sexually assaulted on a call. Firefighters in Nottinghamshire tackle one of the biggest blazes they’ve ever seen, and the Police Federation recognise the actions of officers across England and Wales.

episodes.name: Helicopters Attacked
episodes.overview: It’s a busy night in Newcastle for Northumbria Police as they work the night-time economy shift. We take a look at one of the most dangerous specialties in the police – firearms. The National Police Air Service face danger in the air.
